description: Main entry point for a Flutter application called Baby Name Finder. It sets up providers for state management, localization, and defines the main widget structure including the navigation logic with bottom tabs.

classes.name: BabyNameFinderApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app, sets up multi-provider and MaterialApp with theme and localization.

classes.name: MainNavigationScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget managing bottom navigation among main app screens.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the main navigation screen, including bottom navigation bar and associated screens.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes Flutter bindings and runs the root widget.
